channel.title: Need help uploading to uppit
channel.description: Well , I have my server client and source picked out , i can host 24/7 i portfowarded and all that and i can log into my server.Now the tricky part is how can i get other people to join , like how to i make a download link on uppit or media fire? If you can help just comment below thanks!!!
